articles.description: The Brad Pitt movie dropped 55 percent: With no new big movies to drive audiences, they weren't excited by the holdovers.
articles.content: If you don’t build it, they won’t come. With no new major titles this week, audiences chose to stay home this weekend — and for the next two months, that could be our new normal. “Bullet Train” (Sony… [+6962 chars]
